23-004CH.summary: Recommendation to receive and file the Cultural Heritage Page 1 of 7411 W. OCEAN BLVDCIVIC CHAMBERS, 5:00 PMTUESDAY, FEBRUARY 28, 2023CITY OF LONG BEACHCULTURAL HERITAGE COMMISSION MINUTESCommission minutes of January 31, 2023.A motion was made by Commissioner Hunter, seconded by Commissioner Bodek, to approve recommendation. The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 4 - Amy Bodek, Mark Grisafe, Tasha Hunter and Kevin McGuanAbsent: 2 - Lourdes Ramos and Kathleen IrvineDIRECTOR'S REPORTAlison Spindler-Ruiz, Planning Bureau Manager, presented the Director's Report. Alejandro Plascencia, Project Planner, spoke.REGULAR AGENDA1.

23-003CH.summary: Recommendation to approve a Certificate of Appropriateness to allow a 464 square-foot addition to the rear of the ground flood and upper floor of a single-family dwelling. Conversion of an existing 555 square-foot loft upper over the detached 2-car garage into an Accessory Dwelling Unit is also a part of this project, however due to State Legislation, the ADU is deemed approved, as it has been over 61-days since application. Hence it is not under CHC's purview for review and consideration. The property is located at 3039 E. 1st Street within the Coastal Zone in the Bluff Park  Historic District and in the Two-Family Residential District with Large Lots (R-2-L) Zoning District. It is a Contributor to the Bluff Park Historic District. (District 2).Alejandro Plascencia, Project Planner, introduced Elijio Sandoval, Project Planner, who presented the staff report. Jeff Jeannette, Project Applicant, spoke.Commissioner Grisafe spoke.Jeff Jeannette, Project Applicant, spoke.Page 2 of 7411 W. OCEAN BLVDCIVIC CHAMBERS, 5:00 PMTUESDAY, FEBRUARY 28, 2023CITY OF LONG BEACHCULTURAL HERITAGE COMMISSION MINUTESA dialogue ensued between Commissioner Grisafe and Jeff Jeannette, Project Applicant.Commissioner Bodek spoke.Alejandro Plascencia, Project Planner, spoke.Commissioner Bodek spoke.Commissioner Grisafe spoke.Alejandro Plascencia, Project Planner, spoke.Alison Spindler-Ruiz, Planning Bureau Manager, spoke.Vice Chair McGuan spoke.Commissioner Bodek spoke.Vice Chair McGuan spoke.Louise Ivers provided public comment.Marco Pizzo provided public comment.Jeff Mallin provided public comment.Vice Chair McGuan spoke.Commissioner Bodek spoke.Alejandro Plascencia, Project Planner, spoke.Commissioner Bodek spoke.A dialogue ensued between Commissioner Bodek and Alejandro Plascencia, Project Planner.Jeff Jeannette, Project Applicant, spoke.Commissioner Bodek spoke.Jeff Jeannette, Project Applicant, spoke.A dialogue ensued between Commissioner Bodek and Jeff Jeannette, Project Applicant.Page 3 of 7411 W. OCEAN BLVDCIVIC CHAMBERS, 5:00 PMTUESDAY, FEBRUARY 28, 2023CITY OF LONG BEACHCULTURAL HERITAGE COMMISSION MINUTESCommissioner Grisafe spoke.Jeff Jeannette, Project Applicant, spoke.Commissioner Grisafe spoke.A dialogue ensued between Commissioner Grisafe and Jeff Jeannette, Project Applicant.Commissioner Bodek spoke.Vice Chair McGuan spoke.Erin Weesner-McKinley, Deputy City Attorney, spoke.Alison Spindler-Ruiz, Planning Bureau Manager, spoke.Commissioner Bodek spoke.Alison Spindler-Ruiz, Planning Bureau Manager, spoke.Commissioner Bodek spoke.Erin Weesner-McKinley, Deputy City Attorney, spoke.Commissioner Bodek spoke.Erin Weesner-McKinley, Deputy City Attorney, spokeCommissioner Grisafe spoke.Erin Weesner-McKinley, Deputy City Attorney, spoke.Commissioner Grisafe spoke.Jeff Jeannette, Project Applicant, spoke.Commissioner Bodek spoke.Erin Weesner-McKinley, Deputy City Attorney, spoke.Commissioner Bodek spoke.Page 4 of 7411 W. OCEAN BLVDCIVIC CHAMBERS, 5:00 PMTUESDAY, FEBRUARY 28, 2023CITY OF LONG BEACHCULTURAL HERITAGE COMMISSION MINUTESA motion was made by Commissioner Bodek, seconded by Commissioner Grisafe, to approve recommendation with modified conditions. The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 4 - Amy Bodek, Mark Grisafe, Tasha Hunter and Kevin McGuanAbsent: 2 - Lourdes Ramos and Kathleen Irvine2.
